headline: Jim Cramer on KKR & Co. Inc. (KKR): ‘Maybe Holding Onto Positions Isn’t Such A Bad Move’
summary: We recently compiled a list of the Jim Cramer Discussed 18 Companies That Hit $100 Billion in Market Cap in 2024. In this article, we are going to take a look at where KKR & Co. Inc. (NYSE:KKR) stands against the other companies that hit $100 billion in market cap in 2024. Jim Cramer, the host […]
